metadata.Plot: In World War One, Sergeant Tony Michael (Larry J. Blake) saves the life of Dick Cameron ('Henry Hunter')who tells him he can have anything he wants when they return to the states. About fifteen years later, Tony, who has lived on the edge of lawlessness since the war ended, travels to the dairy farm in Illinois owned by the Cameron family. Dick has died but his younger brother, Kirk, invites Tony to stay and help him run the operation. Modern cattle-rustlers , using large trucks, are stealing cattle from the herds and selling them at auctions hundreds of miles away. Because of his past, the local farmers suspect Tony of being a member of the gang.
metadata.Writer: Maurice Geraghty, Ford Beebe, Kimball Herrick
metadata.Actors: Noah Beery Jr., Kay Hughes, Larry J. Blake
